messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] conference in TX
messages.msgSnippet: .  I m on the Guadalupe River in New ... Is that where that big water park is?  And is it somewhere near Wimberley? Just curious, I have 2 uncles who live in
messages.messageBody:
. I'm on the Guadalupe River in New
> Braunfels.

Is that where that big water park is? And is it somewhere near Wimberley?
Just curious, I have 2 uncles who live in Wimberley and we visit sometime,
so if we ever do again, I'd love to hook up with all of you TX unschoolers
who may be in the area.

Thanks,
Karen
in South Dakota

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] conference in TX
messages.msgSnippet: WAHOOOOO!!!!!!  I didn t know about it, but will check it out.  I m on the Guadalupe River in New Braunfels.  I guess it s about a 5-hour drive to Irving.
messages.messageBody:
WAHOOOOO!!!!!! I didn't know about it, but will
check it out. I'm on the Guadalupe River in New
Braunfels. I guess it's about a 5-hour drive to
Irving.

THANK YOU!!!

Stephanie Jackson, Mommie to Clara Rhyse and Bella Pearl

We borrow it from our children.

From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Misty Felner
Sent: Thursday, May 25, 2006 11:55 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] conference in TX


Stephanie Jackson wrote:
>>> I'm in TX. It'd be great to have one near here,
too.<<<<

Someone may have responded to this, but fyi, there is an unschooling
conference in TX. It's called rethinking education and it's Labor day in
Irving. Visit www.rethinkingeducation.com I'll be there with my family,
and I hope some of you will be too. Where in TX are you?

Misty
